Title: Egbin fire incident disrupts power supply in Ikorodu, environs
Summary: A fire incident occurred at the Egbin Power Plc at about 6:30 am on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, has disrupted power supply in Ikorodu . The Transmission Company of Nigeria (TCN) disclosed this in a statement .

Title: Rema’s ‘Rave & Roses’ hits 3 billion Spotify streams
Summary: Nigerian music star Divine Ikubor, popularly known as Rema, has made global music history . His debut album Rave & Roses (Ultra) becomes the first African album to cross 3 billion streams on Spotify .

Title: Tinubu names new NERC boss, two commissioners
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has appointed Abdullahi Garba Ramat as the new Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) Ramat, 39, is an electrical engineer with a background in engineering .

Title: Police deny viral ghost town video in Kwara
Summary: The Kwara State Police Command has denied a viral video portraying Ganmu Ahileri village, around Babanla in Ifelodun Local Government, as a ghost town . Kwarans, however, complemented the video of the deserted community, explaining that the residents are not ghosts .

Title: Davido, Chioma land in Miami ahead of white wedding
Summary: David Adeleke, better known as Davido, has landed in Miami, United States, with his wife, Chioma Rowland, as final plans for their white wedding take shape . The couple touched down on Wednesday, August 8, 2025, aboard a private plane .

Title: Ballon d’Or 2025: 3 African players nominated for best player
Summary: Three standout African stars have made the 30-man shortlist for the 2025 Men’s Ballon d’Or . Three standout players have earned their place among the world's elite .

Title: Osun 2026: APC aspirants unelectable – Adeleke’s aide
Summary: The governorship aspirants under the All Progressives Congress, APC, in Osun State have been described as a set of unelectable persons ahead of the 2026 governorship election in the state .

Title: Netanyahu says Israel to control not govern Gaza
Summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says Israel plans to take full control of Gaza but does not intend to govern it . His security cabinet convened on Thursday to discuss the country's war plans .

Title: 15,000 women to receive N5bn grants as 25 GBV perpetrators get death sentence in Kaduna
Summary: The Kaduna State Government says 25 GBV perpetrators have been sentenced to death . It is part of efforts to curb the menace in the state . 15,000 women to receive N5bn grants as part of the efforts .

Title: Minister appeals to Borno people to halt farming at Alau Dam reconstruction site
Summary: Recall that in September 2024, the Alau Dam, which collapsed, led to severe flooding where many lives were lost . Critical infrastructure and buildings worth billions of Naira destroyed/submerged .
